Methods.Name: add
Examples:
// assuming Select2 was defined in the same file above
PAGE.add('Lib.Select2', Select2)

// example returning 
var ticker = PAGE.add('BaseClass.ticker', new Ticker('tickerDiv'))
Methods.Description: This is the foundation of adding new items into the global name space. It's mean't to be extremely fast to add. If you have existing code for example, you can always add it after the fact as many of the following examples will demonstrate.

Definitions.Path: Path of the item added, example 'Constructors.YourConstructor'
